===============================================
BOOTSTRAP CSS FILES - README
===============================================

This directory contains Bootstrap CSS framework files.

Files included:
- bootstrap.css: Main Bootstrap stylesheet
- bootstrap.min.css: Minified version
- bootstrap.rtl.css: RTL (Right-to-Left) support
- bootstrap-grid.css: Grid system only
- bootstrap-utilities.css: Utility classes
- bootstrap-reboot.css: CSS reset

Note: These are vendor files from Bootstrap 5.3.3
Do not modify directly - use custom CSS for overrides.

===============================================
